CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( amc__Billing_Type__c , "Fixed Price") , amc__Cost_Budget__c - (amc__Hours_Scheduled_Value_Cost__c + amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(amc__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price + Expenses"), (amc__Cost_Budget__c + amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c) - (amc__Hours_Scheduled_Value_Cost__c + amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c) , (amc__Hours_Scheduled_Cost__c + amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c) - (amc__Hours_Scheduled_Value_Cost__c + amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the P&L for the Project based on the Scheduled figures. If Fixed Price, use the Project Budget, otherwise use the Hours Scheduled Value Billable + Anticipated Expenses, then minus Scheduled Value Cost + Anticipated Project Expenses + Mat Costs
CustomField.label: P&L (Scheduled)
